title: Lord of the Rings - Battle for middle earth II + Witch King Expa
description:
*** Install steps for both games (only serial codes are different) ***

1. Install with 1 of the serial codes below.

Serials:

Original game:
BRU4-T26A-QQGT-4FHS-QGDM 
RLSA-E38Y-CE6D-YCEG-HRLD
WWLL-EH2V-EMP7-5EMZ-BRLD
EMXX-U93U-6BT7-86B5-CRLD

Witch king expansion:
7FRR-P794-5MGC-X5MC-GRLD
D5XF-TTVD-N43X-VN4B-YRLD
PHJA-AAMF-L5GP-KL5H-RRLD
K6XX-S5RC-WHYS-YWHL-URLD

2. Copy crack file "game.dat" to install folder.
3. Run the game once (this will create the roaming folder for you)
4. Add options.ini file to your roaming folder.

C:UsersusernameappdataroamingMy The Lord of the Rings, The Rise of the Witch-king Files

And

C:UsersusernameappdataroamingMy Battle for Middle-earth(tm) II Files
